title: The meta isn't the see all, tell all everyone thinks it is.
body: Just play what you want and you will have fun and win the game. The meta doesn't define who has to be played.

replies.body: Just played these two. Full support team in one, Full beard team with teleports in the other. Was the most fun I had in league ever (and with strangers)

True story. I rarely pick tanky supports, or tanks in general. I prefer long range, caster champions. And really only pick front line tanky fighters / tanks when absolutely necessary.

I know tanks are considered OP atm, but just because they are good. Doesn't mean you'll see me locking in {{champion:89}} every single game. (Sure if we have 0 other tanks, i'll pick her).

But sticking with what your comfortable using, and enjoy has proven to be 100x better in solo que then blindly following the meta.

had a pretty sick panth game today i believe i reached 16-0 at some point. i have the replay. still lost (my fault) but still was hella fun. 
and got a nice ult off and got quadra kill.
